extension.description: ARD- und ZDF-Mediathek, einschließlich Live-TV mit Aufnahmefunktion, Merkliste, Live-Radio, Podcasts. Screenshots siehe https://github.com/rols1/PluginPictures/tree/master/Kodi/ARDundZDF. Wicki zu den Settings siehe https://github.com/rols1/Kodi-Addon-ARDundZDF/wiki.

extension.summary: waipu.tv und O2 TV Kodi Video Plugin
waipu.tv and O2 TV Kodi Video Plugin
extension.description: An waipu.tv and O2 TV video plugin for Kodi mediacenter. Note: This is not an official waipu plugin and not related to Exaring AG or waipu.tv. It was developed by volunteers.

Genießen Sie über 100 TV-Sender von Waipu.tv oder O2 TV im Live-Stream. Hinweis: Dies ist kein offizielles Waipu-Plugin und steht nicht in Verbindung zur Exaring AG oder zu waipu.tv. Es wurde von Freiwilligen entwickelt.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, June 2007
extension.news: - 0.8.0 Python3 compatibility - 0.3.3 fix internal imports - 0.3.2 Implement VoD - 0.3.1 Adjust mechanize dependency to keep Leia compatible - 0.3.0 Add python3 support - 0.2.9 Display and play active recordings - 0.2.8 Add O2 Branding and smaller improvements - 0.2.7 Improve O2 error handling (encoding of plus) [thx user alexxx] - 0.2.6 Improve O2 error handling (encoding of underscore) - 0.2.5 Improve O2 error handling - 0.2.4 Implement O2 Authentication [thx user DjLeXuS06] - 0.2.3 Fix: recordings are not displayed - 0.2.2 rework settings; display account/network status; add metadata; hide locked recordings - 0.2.1 improve pictogram filtering; set python krypton compatible; use program order - 0.2.0 Add options to remove pictograms, update disclaimer, change user_agent - 0.1.3 Provide metadata on channel playback - 0.1.2 Show only channels an account can play; code cleanup - 0.1.1 Fix: settings option for slider (int) - 0.1.0 Fix strings/translations; add stream type selection - 0.0.12 Add settings, language support - 0.0.11 fix: script.module.dateutil dependency - 0.0.10 Add simple epg - 0.0.9 TV channels: use sd logos. Recordings: add metadata - 0.0.8 Add recordings - 0.0.7 Changes from user realvito integrated - 0.0.6 Inputstreamhelper support - 0.0.5 Bugfix: base64decode padding - 0.0.4 Ask for login credentials; Add DRM channels (experimental) - 0.0.3 First implemantation of DRM (not working) - 0.0.2 Show Channel Logos - 0.0.1 Initial alpha version

extension.summary: Wrappers around Kodi Python API for seamless Python 2/3 compatibility
extension.description: Wrappers around Kodi Python API that normalize handling of textual and byte strings in Python 2 and 3.
extension.news: 0.1.2: - Use different method for Unicode error handling. 0.1.1: - Fixed UnicodeDecodeErrors when Kodi API returns non-UTF-8 byte strings. 0.1.0: - Implemented lazy patching of Kodi API functions and classes. 0.0.3: - Added xbmcdrm module.

extension.summary: Joyn Video On Demand and Live TV
Joyn Video On Demand and Live TV
extension.description: Watch VOD content und Live TV provided by Joyn
Video On Demand und Live TV von Joyn
extension.disclaimer: The use of this addon may violate the terms and conditions of Joyn GmbH - especially, but not exclusively, if it is used outside of Germany.
Die Nutzung dieses Addon verstösst eventuell gegen die AGB der Joyn GmbH - insbesondere, aber nicht ausschliesslich, wenn es außerhalb von Deutschland verwendet wird
extension.news: v2.3.1.3 fix DST bug implement xbmc.python 3.0.0 api changes v2.3.1.2 fix license based display for tvshows, season, epsiodes add license based display for complation/-items make installation of script.module.uepg optional / on demand minor other bugfixes v2.3.1.1 Hotfix: Website changed again v2.3.1 improve addon overall addon performance by reusing languageinvoker/splitting into submodules/logging on demand only create singleton-instances on per addon-handle basis cache epg/landing-page in libjoyn-instance fix playback on OSX create fake-uuid for allwinner android sdk level 24 (importing uuid module crashes kodi) implement own get_node() and make it more unique (espacially on android) fix set sort as per settings on matrix use window.setProperty for asset_id instead of 'hiding' in it imdb-infolabel make sure only playback for this addon is tracked in service.py fix relogin issue, when decrypting username/password fails fix language files v2.3.0 add api-based resume postions partly fixed live stream audio sync issue add save username/password option add option to show categories in main menu add ask-for-login dialog on first addon start show content based on current subscription add option to hightlight premium content rework some stuff

extension.summary: Play Live TV and recorded shows from Zattoo.
Zattoo Live TV, Aufnahmen und EPG
extension.description:
ZattooHiQ-19 is Zattoo-HiQ for Kodi-19 Matrix
Play Live TV and recorded shows from Zattoo. - switch between favourites/all channels - channels preview - EPG: live/setup recording/recall (for paying Zattoo customers) - search shows - teletext - settings: stream quality, default language - touchscreen support

ZattooHiQ-19 ist Zattoo-HiQ for Kodi-19 Matrix
Zattoo Live TV, Aufnahmen und EPG - wechsel zwischen Favoriten/Allen Kanälen - Kanalvorschau - EPG: Live/Aufnahmen programieren/Recall (mit Zattoo Abo) - Sendungen suchen - Teletext - Einstellungen: Stream Qulität, Standart Sprache (Zweikanalton) - Touchscreen Unterstützung
extension.disclaimer: Check http://www.zattoo.com for availability in your country.
Überprüfe ob http://www.zattoo.com in Deinem Land verfügbar ist.
